title: Kenilworth Park & Aquatic Gardens: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 15, 2016  Plan Your Visit to the Annual Lotus and Water Lily Festival  Celebrate the National Park Service Centennial and explore the wild wetlands of  Kenilworth Park and Aquatic Gardens during the annual Lotus and Water Lily Festival on Saturday, July 16! This year’s festival highlights Asian and East African culture, which both have strong connections to aquatic lotuses and lilies.   April 18, 2016  Kenilworth Park and Aquatic Gardens highlighted with new Forever Stamp  Kenilworth Park & Aquatic Gardens is highlighted with a new Forever Stamp as the Postal Service reveals 11th of 16 stamps celebrating National Park Service’s Centennial.
